patthana20.2:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)

patthana20.2:14.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
patthana20.2:15.1_1: Neither gives rise to gaining material things.
patthana20.2:15.1_2: the world doesn’t arise because of contentment, the cause and conditions for the reason.

patthana20.2:17.1_0: (This should not be expanded as for the sake of this world.)
patthana20.2:18.1_0: for the sake of cause, based on the five reasons you’re not rid of greed, five, ten, twenty, thirty, or forty.
patthana20.2:5.1_0: Neights causes and conditions that give rise to diversity.
patthana20.2:5.1_1: Not seeing the cause of a reason to give rise to unarisen teaching.

patthana20.2:6.1_0: For a cause of a reason that this is the reason for the teaching.
patthana20.2:7.1_0: for the teaching of the noble ones, not the support of the teaching.
patthana20.2:7.1_1: You don’t understand the teaching from the text ...
patthana20.2:8.1_0: The reason for three supports, three on which lots of property are found in one place and two, three, four, five, three, two, or three. Afterwards there are two results in a single place of loss, which they speaking.
patthana20.2:8.1_1: He drains on the road, together with three modes,: three is called “Onces”. ...
